question: Uturebanyuma dukoreshwa

options: kutarenza umuvuduko wa km20 mu isaha
uburebure bwabyo habariwemo ibyo bitwaye bukaba butarengeje m6
A na B nibyo bisubizo by'ukuri
question: binyabiziga bihinga n'ibindi bikoresho byihariye bikoreshwa n'ibigo bipatana imirimo,  iyo bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa igihe cya nijoro cyangwa bitewe n'uko ibihe  bimeze bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 bishobora kugaragazwa inyuma  n'amatara 2 atukura, bipfa kuba bitarenza ibipimo bikurikira:

options: Igihe utwaye ikinyabiziga Ku muvuduko wa 20km/h
question: Telephone ngendanwa ntigomba gukoreshwa:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenga abiri y'ubwoko bumwe keretse  kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:

options: inziga zishobora gushyirwaho imigwegwe irwanya ubunyerere
inziga zishobora gushyirwaho iminyururu irwanya ubunyerere
question: Kugirango ikinyabiziga kive ahantu hari urwondo cyangwa hanyerera bidasanzwe  hashobora gukoreshwa uburyo bukurikira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Itara n'icyatsi kibisi rishyirwa ku modoka cyangwa kuri romoroki ikuruwe rituma  umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy'uwitegura kumunyuraho rigomba gushyirwa he?
Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n'igare cyangwa velomoteri ntiburenza ibipimo  bikurikira:

Ku byerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n'ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana  ihindura ry'ibyerekezo byabyo. Birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa  utugarurarumuri uretse ibitegetswe ariko ntibireba amatara akurikira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: Kwihuta cyane kugirango usoze urugendo vuba.
Kuva mumuhanda urombereje w'ibice byinshi ugahagarara ahantu hatekanye.
question: Mugihe uri murugendo rurerure mumuhanda urombereje w'ibice byinshi.niki wakora  mugihe wumva utangiye kugira ibitotsi?

options: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga agomba kugabanya umuvuduko no gutambukana  ubwitonzi
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora iki ahuye n'ikinyabiziga giturutse mukindi kerekezo,  gicanye amatara yumuhondo aburira ?

Ikintu cyose cyatuma hahindurwa ibyanditswe bireba nyirikarita cyangwa ibiranga  ikinyabiziga kigomba kumenyeshwa ibiro by'imisoro haba mu magambo cyangwa mu  ibaruwa ishinganye. Ibyo bikorwa mu gihe kingana gute:

options: cm 30 ku bugari bw'icyo kinyabiziga kidapakiye
Ubugari ntarengwa budakuka ni metero 2 na sentimetero 50
A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'ibinyamitende itatu n'ubwiyikorewe n'ibinyamitende 4  bifite cyangwa bidafite moteri kimwe n'ubw'iyikorewe na romuruki zikuruwe n'ibyo  binyabiziga ntibushobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:

options: Ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande rwayo
question: Ijambo “akayira” bivuga inzira nyabagendwa ifunganye yagenewe gusa:
Umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ushobora gucibwa ku muhanda kugirango  ugaragaze ibi bikurikira:
Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by'umwihariko, umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka  zikoreshwa nk'amavatiri y'ifasi cyangwa amatagisi zifite uburemere bwemewe  butarenga kilogarama 3500 ni:

options: Ikinyabiziga cya kabiri kiri mu buryo bwiza bwo gukata ikoni ry'iburyo
Ikinyabiziga cya mbere kiri mu buryo bwiza bwo gukata ikoni ry'iburyo
Ikinyabiziga cya gatatu kiri mu buryo bwiza bwo gukata ikoni ry'iburyo
Ikinyabiziga cya kane kiri mu buryo bwiza bwo gukata ikoni ry'iburyo
question: Muri ibi binyabiziga bine ni ikihe kiri mu buryo bwiza bwo gukata ikoni ry'iburyo kiva  mu muhanda munini kijya mu muto?

options: Guhagarara kumurongo wo guhagarara umwanya moto
question: Ugeze mu masangano y'umuhanda aho usanga ibimenyetso bimurika bidakora,  wakora iki igihe umukozi ubifiye ububasha aguhaye iki kimenyesto ?
